/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the buildings that line the street. These structures are adorned with vibrant signs and advertisements, adding a splash of color to the urban landscape. Cars and buses are seen navigating the road, indicating a busy day in the city. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the bustling activity below.
